messages.creationmessage: Alright, we'll open a commissions channel for you where we can discuss what to do with the clothing!

channel.topic: This channel is for discussing clothing commissions.
channel.message: Please describe what you want to commission in the custom clothing, feel free to use images or other media to describe it!

embed.title: Custom Clothing
embed.description:
The default pricing for custom clothing is:
- €3 Shirt / Pants
- €4 Mask / Glasses / Headwear
- €6 Vest / Backpack
- ~~€30~~ €25 Full custom set of clothing. `17% off!` 

All clothes will be made fully custom within reason, and custom clothing can have custom names, before release there are an infinite amount of revisions possible, once implemented into the game there is a maximum of 3 revisions allowed.
By commissioning custom clothing you agree to the following terms:

That other people are able to use the clothing, however keep in mind it will still be seen as your clothing.
Revisions are only revisions, not a full new set of clothing.

By commissioning custom mods you agree that other people are able to use the mod, however keep in mind it will still be seen as your mod.

embed.description:
All bots will be made fully custom within reason, and custom bots can have custom names, before release there are an infinite amount of revisions possible, once implemented into the game there is a maximum of 3 revisions allowed.
By commissioning custom bots you agree that other people are able to use the bot, however keep in mind it will still be seen as your bot.
